snippet: Semion Shkolnik, a painter from Ukraine, battled prostate cancer and is raising his 13-year-old son on his own.
abstract: Edith and Carl Marks Jewish Community House of Bensonhurst buys a winter coat and clothes for Semion Shkolnik, Russian immigrant who neglected his career as a painter to care for his wife, who died of gastric cancer, and his son; Shkolnik is himself in remission from prostate cancer.
lead_paragraph: Semion Shkolnik, a painter from Ukraine, battled prostate cancer and is raising his 13-year-old son on his own.
